name: Hjyl Comment Spam
author: hjyl

sections.description: A simple Anti Spam for Comment by number or including character.
sections.installation:
e.g.

  1. Upload hjyl-comment-spam directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can choose if you need the Anti Spam include character by plugin admin page.
sections.changelog:
2018.02.05 Fix the bug when not input Anti Spam,
change some CSS style,
add admin page, and add the option that include character.
